Oddity in the Scrollbar
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Oddity in the Scrollbar
By torey luvullo on Friday, June 21, 2002 - 03:25 am:

by the scrollbar, i mean that thing that pops up, usually when you feed your monster, but sometimes at other times, that says things like "cool/bad" or "faithful/good". My current dummy is an octopee/morx. he has a scrollbar that says "nervous/bad", but the only time you see it is when he does a "great" in a drill, and you say "great job". if you say "as expected" or "progressing" or the other things, he doesn't get it. it doesnt show up when he eats or rests either. this is the most limited scrollbar i have ever seen.

and i have not the slightest idea what it means, or if it has any practical implications for my monster.

By Lisa Shock on Friday, June 21, 2002 - 09:00 am:

The one thing I know about the scrollbar is that, as you see it, it's an exclusive to the US game. In the Japanese game, I saw scrollbars, but all they ever said was the name of the region the monster was in, as if had somehow become acclimated.

By Eminem on Friday, June 21, 2002 - 10:48 am:

yeah, i have the same thing with my durahan, i was confused about that

By torey luvullo on Friday, June 21, 2002 - 04:32 pm:

like so many of these scrollbars, it disappeared after the next growth spurt.

By The D on Friday, June 21, 2002 - 04:56 pm:

My Gramper (Zoom/T) had a scroll bar through out its whole life. It said Stinky Feet/Bad after every week. I don't know if it would have said this after a training because I rested him everday. Maybe it would have only been after rests, but some scroll bars last the whole monsters life.

By otheous on Saturday, June 22, 2002 - 07:26 am:

i had a joker with cold, and a scrollbar saying cold-bad came up for about two weeks. i gave it a large egg and after the eating animation, the cold-bad scrollbar appeared on more time. then i checked the characteristics and it was gone.
maybe tecmo added those scrollbars too hastily, and they are full of bugs.. or maybe i dont understand them yet..
and congradulations, torey! i think you get credit for naming this thing!

By Eric B on Thursday, October 3, 2002 - 12:00 pm:

i think it might just list what your monster is all about. like if your bad or anything, it would show you just to remind you. but on the effect of glitching, maybe it goes away when you evolve?
